flawed_nl_solution:
Today, Sheila’s piggy bank has $3000 + $7000 = $<<3000+7000=10000>>10000
Sheila will be saving for 4 years which is equivalent to 12 months/year * 4 years = <<12*4=48>>48 months
In 4 years, she will save $276/month * 48 months = $<<276*48=13428>>13428
The piggy bank will have a total of $10000 + $13428 = $<<10000+13428=23428>>23428

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13248, not 13428. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
